bibl.title: The Text of P46: Evidence of the Earliest "Commentary" on Romans?

series.title: Texts and Editions for New Testament Study.

bibl.title: New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World
bibl.author: HOLMES, Michael W.

bibl.note: P46 = P. Chester Beatty II (= van Haelst 497).
HOLMES Michael W., The Text of P46: Evidence of the Earliest "Commentary" on Romans?
Thomas J. KRAUS and Tobias NICKLAS (Edd.), New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World = Texts and Editions for New Testament Study. 2 (Leiden - Boston, 2006) pp. 189-206.
